content.rendered:
The big dreams of the beautiful and extremely talented Eda Yildiz (Hande Erçel) are shattered when her scholarship to the University of Italy is withdrawn. The innocent cause of the scholarship scandal is the hugely successful architect Serkan Bolat (Kerem Bürsin), for whom all women bile. However, the girl is not overwhelmed by the man and is ready to take revenge. Eda and Serkan are embroiled in a battle from which only an overwhelming love can emerge victorious.”

Number of seasons: 2 (2020-2021)

Status: Finished

Creator: Ayse Uber Kutlu

Channel: FOX

Starring: Hande Erçel, Kerem Bürsin, Evrim Dogan
